extendedInfo.description: Infinite space. The earth that shines particularly in stars who have number. A blue dragon is watching this beautiful nature.Two animations to enjoy!Change other animation by scrolling.Replay and pause by tap.*To use:Menu>Wallpapers>LiveWallpapers->Dragon Star&Blue Free*Portrait only.*This wallpaper is trial version for one day.The animation does not play after one day.However, if you reinstall, you can use again.Full versionhttps://market.android.com/details?id=com.dmf.wall.DragonStarBlue*The scrolling depends behavior of Home application.If scrolling does not work or something strange, try to check Home app's settings.(scrolling speed, overshoot, etc.)*Please resetting if the screen turn black when updating it with setting the wallpaper.

reviews.title: Love these
reviews.comment: Very nice! I like the blue one (just wish he \"did more\".) The purple one is cool! Has a star!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Its cool and all
reviews.comment: I like it but there\'s no verity.
reviews.author: A Google User
